mainText:
I hope you have a nice trip and enjoy your freedom.  Thanks for sharing your
genius, passion and perseveration. I am sure the world need leaders that
inpire people like you did. We did love your work, but I think, what we
loved more, was the passion you printed on it and shared it with us.  I am
sure that is what people learned and will remember.
Enjoy your trip, freedom and rest in peace.  We love you.
author: Diana
